original_text: And they arose, and went to Ziph before Saul: but David and his men were in the wilderness of Maon, in the plain on the south of Jeshimon.
korean_text: 그들이 일어나 사울보다 먼저 십으로 가니라 다윗과 그의 사람들이 광야 남쪽 마온 광야 아라바에 있더니

sentences.original_text: and went to Ziph before Saul
but David and his men were in the wilderness of Maon
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들은 마온 광야에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: in the plain on the south of Jeshimon
